item.title: CE-NAS: An End-to-End Carbon-Efficient Neural Architecture Search Framework
item.description: CE-NAS: A novel framework minimizes the carbon footprint of Neural Architecture Search by dynamically allocating GPU resources based on predicted carbon intensity, achieving state-of-the-art results w…
